messages:
Name: Juan Cazares
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: April 3, 1992
Position: Midfielder
Current club: América Mineiro
Serie A clubs played for: Atlético Mineiro, Corinthians, Fluminense, América Mineiro

América Mineiro midfielder Juan Cazares has taken part in 12 Serie A games in 2023 since joining the club on 22nd August 2023, being selected in the starting XI in one of these and being mostly used off the bench on 11 occasions.

Cazares last made an appearance in a competition game on November 4, playing 13 minutes for América Mineiro against Atlético Mineiro in a 1-1 draw. In total, he has recorded one league assist this term.
In last season's Liga Profesional Argentina, Cazares featured in 19 games for Independiente, scored two goals and provided one assist.
Cazares joined América Mineiro in August 2023 from Fluminense, for whom he made 28 league appearances in total, scoring one goal and providing two assists.
